1.t: (Muhammad), glorify the Name of your lord, the Most High,

3.t: decreed their destinies, and provided them with guidance.

4.t: It is He who has caused the grass to grow,

5.t: then caused it to wither away.

6.t: We shall teach you (the Quran) and you will not forget it

7.t: unless God wills it to be otherwise. He knows all that is made public and all that remains hidden.
7.tr: Illaa maa shaaa'al laah; innahoo ya'lamul jahra Wa-maa yakhfaa

8.t: We shall make all your tasks easy.

9.t: Therefore, keep on preaching as long as it is of benefit.

10.t: Those who have fear of God will benefit

11.t: but the reprobates will turn away

12.t: and suffer the heat of the great fire

13.t: wherein they will neither live nor die.
13.tr: Summa laa yamootu feehaa Wa-laa yahyaa

14.t: Lasting happiness will be for those who purify themselves,

15.t: remember the name of the Lord, and pray to Him.

16.t: However, (the disbelievers) prefer the worldly life

17.t: even though the life hereafter will be better and will last forever.

18.t: This is what is written in the ancient heavenly Books,

19.t: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
